allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Jekyll configuration for GitHub Pages

- Add _config.yml with Cayman theme
- Create index.md as homepage with all guides listed
- Include github-jumpstarter.md guide

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add OpenAI Codex/ChatGPT code generation jumpstarter guide

Comprehensive guide covering ChatGPT''s code generation capabilities,
including setup, best practices, API usage, and integration workflows.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add gitbooks directory with prompt engineering content

Contains structured markdown files for GitBook including
introduction, conversational AI, custom GPTs, and appendix sections.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add gitbooks directory with prompt engineering content

Includes comprehensive GitBook content covering:
- Introduction to prompt engineering and LLMs
- Custom GPTs and agentic AI
- OpenAI platform features \(Canvas, Codex, Projects\)
- Text prompting techniques and frameworks
- Exercises and practical examples
- Assets and media files

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
